name: Incident Response Playbook for Malicious Script Execution
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerability to execute arbitrary script commands on a server, leading to unauthorized access and data exfiltration.

action--ad8bc9a1-dc0b-4e29-8b1a-768f5a1b.name: Kill malicious process
action--ad8bc9a1-dc0b-4e29-8b1a-768f5a1b.description: Terminate any processes executing malicious scripts.

action--cdfebef8-7b38-4fc3-98b4-b4a0f7cb.name: Revert access logs to last known good state
action--cdfebef8-7b38-4fc3-98b4-b4a0f7cb.description: Restore access logs from backup to cover unauthorized accesses.

action--b1e40356-f294-4f5d-a112-6c90a003.name: Run malware scan
action--b1e40356-f294-4f5d-a112-6c90a003.description: Perform a scan of the system to identify and eliminate malware.

scan_clean.description: Flag indicating if the scan has returned clean results.

action--ff4a8cad-82e9-489b-bc5e-6708a613.name: Isolate infected host
action--ff4a8cad-82e9-489b-bc5e-6708a613.description: Take the affected host offline by bringing down the interface.

action--ab9d4320-56a4-4b8f-a8a9-5e3bf379.name: Alert security team
action--ab9d4320-56a4-4b8f-a8a9-5e3bf379.description: Notify the security team of the detected incident.

commands.command: echo 'Alert: Incident detected on host-22' | mail -s 'Security Alert' security-team@example.com
